imdb.title: Omamori Himari
imdb.plot: Seven years ago, Yuto Amakawa 's parents died in a car accident, leaving him alone without a single relative, the only item left of his family being a strange and mysterious amulet given to him by his late grandmother. Ever since ...

episodes.title: Sea Cat Scramble
episodes.plot: Nothing more relaxing than hitting up the beach, right? Well, until the demons attack! After some adventures in shopping, Yuuto, Himari, and their classmates head to the beach. But under the sea lies a demon who seeks to kill Yuuto!

episodes.title: Maid in Cat
episodes.plot: Another demon joins the crew as Shizuku makes the decision to live with Yuuto and the crew. While anguishing over the water demon's domestic skills, Himari gets a job at a local...maid café?! But there's more to the lead employee than meets the eye.

episodes.title: The White Cat of Noihara
episodes.plot: Himari brings Yuuto back to his childhood home in Noihara, but he receives a not-so-warm welcome from the current caretaker. While Himari tries to jog Yuuto's memories, a pair of demons attack! Can Yuuto keep the peace, or is fighting the only solution?

episodes.title: A Troubled Cat and Composure
episodes.plot: Yuuto learns more about the magic imbued inside him and the dangers of Himari losing herself with blood lust. Unwilling to let that happen, Yuuto trains to develop his power. But the girls have a unique training method...can he survive?!

episodes.title: Kiss X Cat X KISS
episodes.plot: Another Demon Slayer appears! But she's not looking for peace with the demonkind. Even worse, she's claiming to be his...fiancé?! Is she here for love or war?

episodes.title: The Cat's Feelings and the Magical Girl's Melancholy
episodes.plot: Kuesu is determined to bind her family with Yuuto's. When he continues to refuse her, what drastic measures will she take?

episodes.title: Curiosity Killed the Cat
episodes.plot: Himari takes time to recover after the battle with Kuesu. But her secret remedy has her acting quite catty! Not wanting Himari to be harmed again, Yuuto decides to take the matter into his own hands and confronts Kuesu.

episodes.title: The Cat Demon's Feelings
episodes.plot: Facing three great demons is a lot to ask of for an untrained Demon Slayer, but as demons crucial to the land are being devoured, it's time for Yuuto to step up. But can he face them without being able to use his power?

episodes.title: Cats, Yuto, and a Maiden's Pure Heart
episodes.plot: The battle heats up for the epic conclusion. Himari gives in to her true demon nature to face Tama, but is she beyond saving? Or will Yuuto finally wield the power within him?
